description: "This 17th century map of Asia is based on a map by the Dutch cartographer Frederik de Wit (c. 1629–1706). The text is in the original Latin, except for the title which has been changed to English. The original cartouche has also been retained."
title: "A New Map of East India. F. Lamb sculp. [In] A Prospect of the most famous parts of the World... by John Speed [cartographic material]."
